max_tokens.info: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Set to 0 for unlimited tokens.

model_name.info: The name of the NVIDIA model to use.

detailed_thinking.info: If true, the model will return a detailed thought process. Only supported by reasoning models.

tool_model_enabled.info: If enabled, only show models that support tool-calling.

base_url.info: The base URL of the NVIDIA API. Defaults to https://integrate.api.nvidia.com/v1.

seed.info: The seed controls the reproducibility of the job.
